channel.title: NPC Talking
channel.description: Hey I have been having trouble with the NPCs talking. I want the non-walkable NPCs to talk, but every NPC talk guide I see goes under the walkable NPC types. Any help?

if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Yeah lulz!”; //What the npc says
}[/quote]
ive just said that…

item.title: NPC Talking
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

if ud like to edit what they say do this;

go into NPCHandler.java

and search for

} if (npcs[i].npcType

then they should be something like this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT THE NPC SAYS"; }

just edit the bit where it says WHAT THE NPC SAYS (it will say what they say not WHAT THE NPC SAYS

if you dont want to edit simply delete the

} if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT THEY SAY"; }

Read full topic
